title: Ineos Grenadiers Bolsters Its Wunderkind Brigade with Teen Sensation Theodor Storm
content:
'Enormous potential': Storm steps straight to WorldTour on three-year deal as team continues to look long-term.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Bolsters Its Wunderkind Brigade with Teen Sensation Theodor Storm on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
